sources.title: The Little Lost Sheep (1939)
sources.description: Little Bo Peep discovers that one of her sheep-students is missing when she counts noses at school. The missing lamb is wandering in the woods and is tricked by the big-bad-wolf into going to the wolf's favorite picnic grounds. Miss Bo Peep enlists the services of detective Krazy Kat, and he and his blood-hounds rescue the victim. Watch on RetroFlix:Â  https://retroflix.org/the-little-lost-sheep-1939/

metadata.Plot: Little Bo Peep discovers that one of her sheep-students is missing when she counts noses at school. The missing lamb is wandering in the woods and is tricked by the big-bad-wolf into going to the wolf's favorite picnic grounds. Miss Bo Peep enlists the services of detective Krazy Kat, and he and his blood-hounds rescue the victim.
metadata.Actors: Mel Blanc, Sara Berner, Danny Webb
